{"id":508606627,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1623819335,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/508606627/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"#define NEGATIVE_LIMIT -2147483648\nclass Solution {\nprivate:\n    double helper(double x, int n)\n    {\n        if (n == 0) return 1;\n        else if (n == 1) return x;\n        double half = helper(x, n / 2);\n\n        if (n % 2) return half * half * x;\n        return half * half;\n    }\npublic:\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        double ans = 1.0;\n        auto divide_once_more = false;\n        if (n == NEGATIVE_LIMIT)\n        {\n            divide_once_more = true;\n            n++;\n        }\n\n        auto is_negative = false;\n        if (n < 0)\n        {\n            n *= -1;\n            is_negative = true;\n        } \n\n        if (is_negative) ans /= helper(x,n);\n        else ans = helper(x,n);\n        if (divide_once_more) ans /= x;\n        return ans;\n\n\n\n\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
